text.div:
Generated Narrative: ConceptMap R5-FormularyItem-element-map-to-R4

Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0 to http://hl7.org/fhir/4.0


Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/FormularyItem|5.0.0 to Basicversion: 4.0.1)

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
FormularyItem.meta (meta)is equivalent toResource.metaElement `FormularyItem.meta` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Resource.meta` and is compatible, use that element instead.
FormularyItem.implicitRules (implicitRules)is equivalent toResource.implicitRulesElement `FormularyItem.implicitRules` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Resource.implicitRules` and is compatible, use that element instead.
FormularyItem.language (language)is equivalent toResource.languageElement `FormularyItem.language` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Resource.language` and is compatible, use that element instead.
FormularyItem.text (text)is equivalent toDomainResource.textElement `FormularyItem.text` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.text` and is compatible, use that element instead.
FormularyItem.contained (contained)is equivalent toDomainResource.containedElement `FormularyItem.contained` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.contained` and is compatible, use that element instead.
FormularyItem.identifier (identifier)is equivalent toBasic.identifierElement `FormularyItem.identifier` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Basic.identifier` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/FormularyItem|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
FormularyItem.code (code)maps to wider concepthttp://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-FormularyItem.codeElement `FormularyItem.code` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped.
FormularyItem.status (status)maps to wider concepthttp://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-FormularyItem.statusElement `FormularyItem.status` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped.

name: R5FormularyItemElementMapToR4
title: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 FormularyItem to FHIR R4 Basic
description: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 FormularyItem to FHIR R4.

target.comment:
Element `FormularyItem.meta` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped.
Element matches Basic element path `Resource.meta` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `FormularyItem.implicitRules` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped.
Element matches Basic element path `Resource.implicitRules` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `FormularyItem.language` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped.
Element matches Basic element path `Resource.language` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `FormularyItem.text` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped.
Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.text` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `FormularyItem.contained` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped.
Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.contained` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `FormularyItem.identifier` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped.
Element matches Basic element path `Basic.identifier` and is compatible, use that element instead.
Element `FormularyItem.code` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped.
Element `FormularyItem.status` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped.
